name.zh: 儿童印花单肩斜挎胸包（多花型）

description.en: A compact kids sling backpack with playful all-over prints. Features a roomy main compartment and quick-access front zipper pocket—ideal for day trips and everyday carry. OEM/ODM customization available for prints, fabrics (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, lining, pocket layout, and packaging.
description.zh: 儿童印花单肩斜挎胸包/小背包，满版印花更活泼。主仓容量充足，前置拉链袋便于快取，适合日常与出游随身携带。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：花型印花、面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
印花：数码印花/热转印（可定制）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
背带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）

en.Compartments: 1 main compartment + front zip pocket + inner pocket (optional)
en.Customization: Prints, fabric, color, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 高 22–30cm × 宽 16–22cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.收纳结构: 1 主仓 + 前拉链袋 + 内袋（可选）
zh.可定制: 花型印花、面料配色、Logo、内里、口袋、拉链五金、包装
